snippet: The Seattle Seahawks, coming off a Super Bowl win, open the season against the revamped Green Bay Packers.
abstract: Preview of NFL season opener between reigning Super Bowl champions Seattle Seahawks and Green Bay Packers.
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Seahawks, coming off a Super Bowl win, open the season against the revamped Green Bay Packers.

headline.main: Preview: Green Bay Packers at Seattle Seahawks
headline.print_headline: Thursday’s Matchup: Green Bay Packers at Seattle Seahawks
